title: Enforce input validation on /search endpoint
description: Add and enforce Zod query validation for /search in packages/cli, ensure handler sanitizes and rejects invalid input, and add tests for happy and edge/error cases.

implementation.notes: Zod schema updated to max 500, runtime normalization and rejection of URLs and invalid characters added. Tests added for rate limiting and validation.

acceptanceCriteria: Handler validates query param 'q' with Zod (non-empty string) and returns 400 for invalid input. Tests cover valid, empty, and malicious input scenarios.
